Class ChromePreferenceStore extends PreferenceStore

A Chrome extension implementation of a PreferenceStore.

Fields

final Stream onPreferenceChange
StreamController streamController

Getters and Setters

Stream<PreferenceEvent> get onPreferenceChange

Constructors

ChromePreferenceStore(StorageArea storageArea)

Methods

void flush()

Flush any unsaved changes to this PreferenceStore. Implementations may flush on each call to setValue (i.e. flush may be a no-op).

Future<String> getValue(String key)

Get the value for the given key. The value is returned as a Future.

Future<String> setValue(String key, String value)

Set the value for the given key. The returned Future has the same value as value on success.
